txt.en: The Quiet Garden is a peaceful place to contemplate the troubles of the world.
You have discovered the Quiet Garden
You have discovered Echad Andestel
You have discovered the Lady's Rest
You have discovered Cerin Nauth
Traders from Dale travelling south became trapped at the foot of the Misty Mountains as the Orcs of Moria poured forth, forcing the Elves of Lórien to grant them aid.
This spot is a favourite resting place of Galadriel, Lady of the Golden Wood.
The ways of Lothlórien are beautiful and restful. It is easy to lose oneself in the peaceful wood.
You have discovered the Vineyards of Lórien
Cerin Nauth is a peaceful hill overlooking the Golden Wood.
You have discovered Imlad Lalaith
The Vineyards of Lórien produce sweet grapes and fine wine for the festivals of the Elves.
You have discovered the Garden of Memory
You have discovered Bain Gwaloth
Imlald Lalaith, the Valley of Laughter, is where most of Lothlórien's feasts take place.
You have discovered Sâd Gilthiriad
This garden recalls the past, when Lothlórien was Laurelindórenan.
You have discovered Cerin Brethil
Bain Gwaloth is a private garden, beautiful and secluded.
This peaceful glade is a perfect spot to view the stars of Elbereth.
NOT USED
This grove of Melbrethil is revered by the Galadhrim.
Wanderer of the Golden Wood
